mapper.select: select car_seq carSeq, rent_amt rentAmt, drive_amt driveAmt, car_num carNum, car_type carType, oil_type oilType, car_option carOption, socar_zone socarZone, car_img carImg from car
select distinct socar_zone socarZone from car

select t2.* from (SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS seq2 ,c.seq ,c.car_num carNum ,c.car_type carType ,c.oil_type oilType ,c.car_option carOption ,c.socar_zone socarZone ,c.rent_amt rentAmt ,c.drive_amt driveAmt ,c.car_img carImg FROM car_v c ,(SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R ) t2 where t2.seq2 between #{start} and #{end} order by t2.seq2 asc
select count(*) as count from car

select count(*) as count from (SELECT c.seq ,c.car_num carNum ,c.car_type carType ,c.oil_type oilType ,c.car_option carOption ,c.socar_zone socarZone ,c.rent_amt rentAmt ,c.drive_amt driveAmt ,c.car_img carImg FROM car_v c WHERE ${keyField} like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') ) t2

select * from( select @NO := @NO + 1 as ROWNUM, A.* from ( select c.car_seq carSeq, c.rent_amt rentAmt, c.drive_amt driveAmt, c.car_num carNum, c.car_type carType, c.oil_type oilType, c.car_option carOption, c.socar_zone socarZone, c.car_img carImg from car c where ${keyField} like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') order by car_seq desc )A, (select @NO := 0)B )C where C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{start} and #{end};

select car_seq carSeq, rent_amt rentAmt, drive_amt driveAmt, car_num carNum, car_type carType, oil_type oilType, car_option carOption, socar_zone socarZone, car_img carImg from car where ${keyField} = #{keyword}

select c.seq ,c.car_num carNum ,c.car_type carType ,c.oil_type oilType ,c.car_option carOption ,c.socar_zone socarZone ,c.rent_amt rentAmt ,c.drive_amt driveAmt ,c.car_img carImg FROM car_v c where ${keyField} = #{keyword}
select count(*) from car_v where car_num = #{carNum}
mapper.insert: { call insert_car( #{carNum, mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carType, mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oilType, mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carOption, mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{socarZone, mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rentAmt, mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{driveAmt, mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carImg, mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) }
